articles.title: Biden's Covid team is nervous about what the Trump team hasn't told them
articles.description: With the hours dwindling until Joe Biden is sworn in -- officially taking the helm of the US government during its worst health crisis in 100 years -- a sense of nervousness has set in among those advising the incoming President on the pandemic.

articles.title: Stunning images from DC show flags representing crowds
articles.description: As Washington, DC prepares for the inauguration of Joe Biden as President of the United States, flags fill the mall to represent crowds who will not be able to attend due to the pandemic.

articles.title: From Trump to Biden: How the transfer of nuclear codes will work
articles.description: With President Donald Trump leaving Washington, DC without meeting President-elect Joe Biden, CNN's Barbara Starr breaks down how the exchange of the United States' nuclear weapon codes will happen.

articles.author: Jack Guy, CNN
articles.title: Spanish police seize more than 2 tons of cocaine hidden in charcoal
articles.description: Spanish police have seized more than two tons of cocaine and arrested 12 people allegedly involved in a large scale drugs smuggling network with connections to Paraguay and Brazil.
